author: Robert Morris
releaseNotes:
Version 3.1.1.: Remove inadvertent logging for custom groups when logging disabled

Version 3.1: Added power meter as "custom" attribute that can be monitored
Version 3.0.1.: Optional volume parameter added.
Version 3.0: Addition of custom attribute checking (e.g., switches and many sensors)

Version 2.6: Added ability to turn on/off switches when devices are/aren't in desired states.

Previous releases:
Added thermostat support and name grouping for contact sensors and locks.

NOTE FOR 1.X UPGRADERS: New parent/child app structure; 1.x users should uninstall first and will require manual re-creation. v2 adds additional options for device notification/TTS text and triggers.
